title: Problem with the rear camera on my pixel 3a
content:
Hi,  my pixel 3a is having focus issues, it doesn't work anymore, all my pictures are blurry. I tried everything that i saw on the google assistance but it still doesn't work. My phone is still under warranty so i would like to return it to get it fixed or get a refund but i can't contact the google assistance due to covid. What can i do?
Thank you.
